title: Picked a ban too fast in ranked and it disconnected me??
body: Usual pick-ban screen, and i click on my ban after they ban, and when i do i get disconnected and receive a 5 minute ban.

replies.body:
How strange, can you verify if this is isolated to your PC or if you can reproduce this issue on another PC.
-SumCoolAid
I'll try on my other PC as soon as the ban is over and let you know soon.

>I'll try on my other PC as soon as the ban is over and let you know soon.

>as soon as the ban is over

>let you know soon.

SOON (tm)
